title: Panic in 1.7.3: runtime error: index out of range: syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/memdb. (*DB).findGE
body:
A new build from source on the 1.7.3 tag on Ubuntu 17.10 using the git branch and setting up a new node with

```
$ "${HOME}/go-ethereum.git/build/bin/geth" \
  --verbosity 4 \
  --syncmode full \
  --cache 4096 \
  --datadir "${HOME}/geth-data"
```

```
$ "${HOME}/go-ethereum.git/build/bin/geth" version
Geth
Version: 1.7.3-stable
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.8.3
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=/usr/lib/go-1.8
```

Got this panic after 2 to 3 hours:

```
DEBUG[01-11|23:22:43] Inserted new block                       number=1437941 hash=389e63…242046 uncles=0 txs=6    gas=181035  elapsed=6.551ms
DEBUG[01-11|23:22:43] Trie cache stats after commit            misses=21212779 unloads=3330615
DEBUG[01-11|23:22:43] Inserted new block                       number=1437942 hash=5c7b75…64eb6c uncles=0 txs=9    gas=206669  elapsed=6.504ms
DEBUG[01-11|23:22:43] Trie cache stats after commit            misses=21212810 unloads=3330623
DEBUG[01-11|23:22:43] Inserted new block                       number=1437943 hash=0bcd43…ff3935 uncles=0 txs=3    gas=86091   elapsed=3.244ms
DEBUG[01-11|23:22:43] Trie cache stats after commit            misses=21213149 unloads=3330639
DEBUG[01-11|23:22:43] Inserted new block                       number=1437944 hash=1f87c0…5d5f19 uncles=0 txs=99   gas=2102091 elapsed=83.434ms
DEBUG[01-11|23:22:43] VM returned with error                   err="out of gas"
DEBUG[01-11|23:22:43] Trie cache stats after commit            misses=21213805 unloads=3330650
panic: runtime error: index out of range

goroutine 99392 [running]:
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/memdb.(*DB).findGE(0xc46dc907e0, 0xc587f793c0, 0x29, 0x33, 0x2d01, 0x499e9, 0x2d00)
	/home/miner-ethereum/go-ethereum.git/build/_workspace/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/memdb/memdb.go:218 +0x19a
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/memdb.(*DB).Put(0xc46dc907e0, 0xc587f793c0, 0x29, 0x33, 0xc580bf530e, 0x27, 0x4f545, 0x0, 0x0)

	/home/miner-ethereum/go-ethereum.git/build/_workspace/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:500 +0x51
created by github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).spawnSync
```

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

After restart:
`panic: can't get node 32AAE9D4B3227A9638F99BC73473C360A93D9AF73DBA6B196ABC5F56A7017EDE: leveldb/table: corruption on data-block (pos=391295): checksum mismatch, want=0x23c63648 got=0x5361b24d [file=421702.ldb]`
